message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is depreciation.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see a line item called "Depreciation" under the "Cash Flow From Operating Activities" section. This is exactly what I'm looking for - the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of assets over their useful lives.

The value associated with this depreciation line item is 120,631.67 as of 2024-02-05.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '120631.67'} }
```
